title: [QUESTION] Is there a way to calculate SKPath.Area?
body:

After searching the web for quite some time now, I can't find appropriate answers, for which the questions are quite simple:

a) Is there a method to calculate the area of an SKPath?
b) Is there a way I can iterate through the SKPath and calculate the area on my own? With Gauss, maybe?
